seo.title: Efectibo Wholesale | Invercenter USA
seo.description: Invite-only B2B marketplace for Invercenter USA and Efectibo LLC wholesale partners.

hero.label: INVERCENTER USA INC X EFECTIBO LLC
hero.title: Private wholesale marketplace powered by Invercenter USA logistics.
hero.description: Efectibo LLC scales its B2B distribution network by leveraging Invercenter infrastructure, standardized processes and international reach. Invite-only access with immediate service.

cardPrimary.title: One operation, two specialists
cardPrimary.description: iNC manages sourcing and international logistics; Efectibo handles local fulfillment and wholesale service.
bullets: Immediate distribution across U.S. Hispanic markets.

cardSecondary.label: Objective
cardSecondary.title: Be the fastest B2B marketplace for Latin retailers and distributors.

inventory.label: Curated inventory
inventory.title: Active Efectibo Wholesale catalog
inventory.description: Three product lines keep the flow constant: entertainment, applied technology and operational equipment. The cards highlight availability examples with packaging ready for retail or last-mile handoff.
inventory.sidecard: Thanks to Invercenter's network, every SKU is supplied through preferred contracts and unified quality controls. That boosts margins and secures deliveries inside the main hubs in under 72 hours.

electronics.name: Premium electronics
electronics.description: Consoles, pro displays and certified accessories for retail and gaming lounges.

technology.name: Applied technology
technology.description: IoT solutions, smart audio and devices for 24/7 commercial operations.

agile.name: Agile equipment
agile.description: Dispatch, packing and mobility kits that accelerate every wholesale operation.

brands.label: Brand carousel
brands.title: Anchor brands in the marketplace
brands.description: We rotate owned and consigned inventory under official agreements with Toshiba, Xbox, Shark and MSI. The carousel mirrors the month-to-month mix.
brands.managed: Managed by Invercenter - Fulfillment by Efectibo LLC

toshiba.name: Toshiba
toshiba.tagline: Displays, 4K TVs and digital signage for demanding retail.

xbox.name: Xbox
xbox.tagline: Hardware, accessories and gaming ecosystems ready for sell-in.

shark.name: Shark
shark.tagline: Premium cleaning and lifestyle lines with constant replenishment.

cta.label: iNC corporate group
cta.title: One vision, two specialized units
cta.description: Invercenter and Efectibo share corporate governance, financial compliance and one goal: connect global brands with the Latin market at the speed digital B2B commerce demands. Keep this private link to reach the preferred catalog.
